Footpath Surface¶

Footpath Surface Object Properties¶

type: object

  • isQueue

Is Queue

  • noSlopeRailings

No Slope Railings

  • editorOnly

Is Editor Only

Is Queue¶

True if path surface is for a queue

type: boolean

default

False

No Slope Railings¶

True if path has no railings on slopes

type: boolean

default

False

Is Editor Only¶

True if path is normally only available in the scenario editor

type: boolean

default

False
